Message:
Only her consciousness
remains intact...
barely keeping her alive.

So then, why...?
Why am I still not dead?

I heard someone’s voice.
It called me...“Skuld.”

I remembered my past...
I remembered my three
younger sisters.

This memory of them,
lovingly calling me
their big sister Skuld...
It belongs to me, and only me.

A person can be free
because they have a home.

Without a home,
they’ll just end up
in loneliness.

I found it—a place
where I can be me.
